trans-unit.source: Provides a managed definition of the `IAdviseSink` interface.
The `IAdviseSink` interface enables containers and other objects to receive notifications of data changes, and view changes and compound-document changes occurring in objects of interest.
For more information about the `IAdviseSink` interface, see the MSDN Library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT.
For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).
Notifies all registered advisory sinks that the object has changed from the running state to the loaded state.
This method is called by a server.

An <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IAdviseSink.OnClose%2A> notification indicates that an object is making the transition from the running state to the loaded state, so its container can take appropriate measures to ensure orderly shutdown.
For example, an object handler must release its pointer to the object.
For more information about `IAdviseSink::OnClose`, see the MSDN Library.
Notifies all data objects currently registered advisory sinks that data in the object has changed.
For more information about `IAdviseSink::OnDataChange`, see the MSDN Library.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC"></xref>, passed by reference, which describes the format, target device, rendering, and storage information of the calling data object.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM"></xref>, passed by reference, which defines the storage medium (global memory, disk file, storage object, stream object, Graphics Device Interface (GDI) object, or undefined) and ownership of that medium for the calling data object.
Notifies all registered advisory sinks that the object has been renamed.
This method is called by a server.
For more information about `IAdviseSink::IMoniker`, see the MSDN Library.
A pointer to the `IMoniker` interface on the new full moniker of the object.
Notifies all registered advisory sinks that the object has been saved.
This method is called by a server.
For more information about `IAdviseSink::OnSave`, see the MSDN Library.
Notifies an object's registered advisory sinks that its view has changed.
This method is called by a server.
For more information about `IAdviseSink::OnViewChange`, see the MSDN Library.
The aspect, or view, of the object.
Contains a value taken from the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.DVASPECT"></xref> enumeration.
The portion of the view that has changed.
Currently, only -1 is valid.
